Spanish cancer drug may reduce Covid load in lungs by 99 per cent 

#Pharma company PharmaMar claims its cancer drug Aplidin has the potential to reduce any #Covid-19 load in lungs by 99 per cent https://t.co/rVGCVYDu5z #Pharma #Covid19 #CovidCure #Coronavirus #Vaccine https://t.co/RB637zlx6j
